thread.section_title: Splendid Etoile Hotel - UPDATED 2016 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Short, but amazing stay!
thread.title_full: Short, but amazing stay! - Review of Splendid Etoile Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Bojan M
title: Short, but amazing stay!
text:
Had a one night stay at this hotel and have nothing but praise for this hotel. Be sure to get superior room that has fantastic view on Arc de Triomphe and enjoy your morning coffee routine or wine evenings on terrace. Overall room was clean and cosy and very quiet and comfortable for good night rest. Hotel staff was very courteous, informative and helpful. I'll definitely stay here again and make sure it is more then one night...
Room Tip: Superior rooms on higher floors have amazing view on Arc d Triomphe See more room tips
